languages.text: {n}Внушительного вида мужчина салютует вам. Его доспех безукоризненно отполирован, у ног сидит огромный кибермастиф. Лицо арбитра не выражает ничего, кроме невозмутимого бесстрастия, и только взгляд холоден и тяжел — как и полагается вершителю закона.{/n} "Проктор-взыскатель Соломон Антар. Приветствую вас от лица {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Адептус Арбитес{/g}".

{n}The formidable-looking man offers you a salute. His armour is immaculately polished, and a hulking cyber-mastiff sits at his feet. The Arbitrator's face reveals nothing but imperturbable equanimity, and his gaze is cold and weighty as befits an enforcer of the law.{/n} "Proctor-Exactant Solomorne Anthar. I greet you on behalf of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}."
languages.original_text: {n}Внушительного вида мужчина салютует вам. Его доспех безукоризненно отполирован, у ног сидит огромный кибермастиф. Приветствую вас от лица {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Адептус Арбитес{/g}".

The Arbitrator's face reveals nothing but imperturbable equanimity, and his gaze is cold and weighty as befits an enforcer of the law.{/n} "Proctor-Exactant Solomorne Anthar. languages.text: {n}El hombre de aspecto formidable se cuadra ante ti. Su armadura tiene un brillo inmaculado y a sus pies se sienta un cibermastín. El rostro del Arbitrator no revela más que una objetividad imperturbable, y su mirada es tan fría y pesada como corresponde a un agente de la ley.{/n} «Procurador-Exactor Solomorne Anthar. Presento mis respetos en nombre del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}».
languages.original_text: {n}The formidable-looking man offers you a salute. His armour is immaculately polished, and a hulking cyber-mastiff sits at his feet. The Arbitrator's face reveals nothing but imperturbable equanimity, and his gaze is cold and weighty as befits an enforcer of the law.{/n} "Proctor-Exactant Solomorne Anthar. I greet you on behalf of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre de aspecto formidable se cuadra ante ti. Su armadura tiene un brillo inmaculado y a sus pies se sienta un cibermastín. El rostro del Arbitrator no revela más que una objetividad imperturbable, y su mirada es tan fría y pesada como corresponde a un agente de la ley.{/n} «Procurador-Exactor Solomorne Anthar. Presento mis respetos en nombre del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}».

languages.text: {n}这个看起来凶神恶煞的人向你敬了个礼。他的盔甲光洁无瑕，脚边坐着一只大块头生化獒犬。这位法务官脸上露出镇定自若的神情，目光沉重而冰冷，与执法者的形象非常相称。{/n}“我是督审监察官索罗蒙·安萨，代表{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}帝国法务部{/g}向你致敬。”
languages.original_text: {n}The formidable-looking man offers you a salute. His armour is immaculately polished, and a hulking cyber-mastiff sits at his feet. The Arbitrator's face reveals nothing but imperturbable equanimity, and his gaze is cold and weighty as befits an enforcer of the law.{/n} "Proctor-Exactant Solomorne Anthar. I greet you on behalf of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个看起来凶神恶煞的人向你敬了个礼。他的盔甲光洁无瑕，脚边坐着一只大块头生化獒犬。这位法务官脸上露出镇定自若的神情，目光沉重而冰冷，与执法者的形象非常相称。{/n}“我是督审监察官索罗蒙·安萨，代表{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}帝国法务部{/g}向你致敬。”

languages.text: {n}L'homme d'allure imposante vous salue. Son armure soigneusement astiquée brille comme un sou neuf, et un énorme cyber-mastiff est assis à ses pieds. L'expression impénétrable de l'arbitrator ne révèle rien d'autre qu'un sang-froid à toute épreuve, et en digne représentant de la loi, il affiche un regard aussi imperturbable que pénétrant.{/n} « Proctor-exactant Solomorne Anthar. Au nom de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}, je vous salue. »
languages.original_text: {n}The formidable-looking man offers you a salute. His armour is immaculately polished, and a hulking cyber-mastiff sits at his feet. The Arbitrator's face reveals nothing but imperturbable equanimity, and his gaze is cold and weighty as befits an enforcer of the law.{/n} "Proctor-Exactant Solomorne Anthar. I greet you on behalf of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme d'allure imposante vous salue. Son armure soigneusement astiquée brille comme un sou neuf, et un énorme cyber-mastiff est assis à ses pieds. L'expression impénétrable de l'arbitrator ne révèle rien d'autre qu'un sang-froid à toute épreuve, et en digne représentant de la loi, il affiche un regard aussi imperturbable que pénétrant.{/n} « Proctor-exactant Solomorne Anthar. Au nom de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}, je vous salue. »

languages.text: {n}恐ろしい見た目の男があなたに敬礼する。彼の防具は清潔に磨かれ、とても図体の大きなサイバーマスチフが彼の足下に座っている。アービトレイターの顔は平然と落ち着いており、彼の視線は法の執行者にふさわしいように冷たく重い。{/n}「エクザタント代理人ソロモーン・アンサール。私は{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}アデプトゥス・アルビテス{/g}を代表してあなたに挨拶します」
languages.original_text: {n}The formidable-looking man offers you a salute. His armour is immaculately polished, and a hulking cyber-mastiff sits at his feet. The Arbitrator's face reveals nothing but imperturbable equanimity, and his gaze is cold and weighty as befits an enforcer of the law.{/n} "Proctor-Exactant Solomorne Anthar. I greet you on behalf of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}恐ろしい見た目の男があなたに敬礼する。彼の防具は清潔に磨かれ、とても図体の大きなサイバーマスチフが彼の足下に座っている。アービトレイターの顔は平然と落ち着いており、彼の視線は法の執行者にふさわしいように冷たく重い。{/n}「代理人ソロモーン・アンサール。私はアデプトゥス・アルビテスを代表してあなたに挨拶します」

languages.text: {n}Heybetli duran adam sana selam veriyor. Zırhı kusursuzca parlatılmış, ayaklarının dibinde ise bir siper mastif oturuyor. Yargıcı'nın yüzünde soğukkanlılıktan başka bir şey görmüyorsun. Bakışları, bir kanun infazcısına yaraşır soğuklukta ve ağırlıkta.{/n} "Zaptçı Üsteğmen Solomorne Anthar. {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g} adına sizi selamlıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}The formidable-looking man offers you a salute. His armour is immaculately polished, and a hulking cyber-mastiff sits at his feet. The Arbitrator's face reveals nothing but imperturbable equanimity, and his gaze is cold and weighty as befits an enforcer of the law.{/n} "Proctor-Exactant Solomorne Anthar. I greet you on behalf of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heybetli duran adam sana selam veriyor. Zırhı kusursuzca parlatılmış, ayaklarının dibinde ise bir siper mastif oturuyor. Yargıcı'nın yüzünde soğukkanlılıktan başka bir şey görmüyorsun. Bakışları, bir kanun infazcısına yaraşır soğuklukta ve ağırlıkta.{/n} "Zaptçı Üsteğmen Solomorne Anthar. {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g} adına sizi selamlıyorum."

languages.text: {n}Der Respekt einflößende Mann salutiert vor dir. Seine Rüstung ist perfekt poliert. Zu seinen Füßen sitzt ein bulliger Cyber-Mastiff. Das Gesicht des Arbitrators strahlt eine gleichmütige Gelassenheit aus. Sein kalter und bedeutsamer Blick macht einem Vollstrecker des Gesetzes alle Ehre.{/n} "Proktor-Exaktant Solomorne Anthar. Ich grüße Euch im Namen der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}."
